p: The extract of this plant has been used as additive in human semen [ 48] incubated at 37 Â°C for 24 h. Three concentrations were used (15, 30, and 45 ppm). The sperm samples treated with this plant extract showed an enhancement in sperm parameters such as motility, velocity, and viability as well as a reduction in DNA fragmentation. These positive results were obtained with the highest extract concentrations (30 and 45 ppm).
